Education

We are commited to sharing knowledge and information for the purposes of enlightenment, empowerment, and education. We develop and sponsor youth support and enhancement programs, as well, business symposia in support local businesses. We act as an information resource making available information on social programs and aids for those in need. 

Operation Re-Boot
